alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:03PM CDT until April 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Southeastern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 303 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Balch Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Mesquite, Balch Springs, Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Hutchins, Sunnyvale, Crandall, Talty, New Terrell City Lake, Elmo, Post Oak Bend City, Oak Ridge, Heartland, Lawrence and Lake Ray Hubbard. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 475 and 506. Interstate 30 between mile markers 54 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
